package com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.s3.transfer.internal;

import com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.event.ProgressEvent;
import com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.event.SyncProgressListener;
import com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.s3.transfer.TransferProgress;

<fim_suffix>public class TransferProgressUpdatingListener extends SyncProgressListener {
    private final TransferProgress transferProgress;

    public TransferProgressUpdatingListener(TransferProgress transferProgress) {
        this.transferProgress = transferProgress;
    }

    public void progressChanged(ProgressEvent progressEvent) {
        long bytes = progressEvent.getBytesTransferred();
        if (bytes == 0)
            return; // only interested in non-zero bytes
        transferProgress.updateProgress(bytes);
    }
}<fim_middle>// class below has no smell
